ai-ya8.1.2:1.1_0: one who has a greedy mind arises when it comes to mind.
ai-ya8.1.2:1.1_1: one whose mind is without greed arises,
ai-ya8.1.2:1.1_7: one who is scattered mind becomes scattered,
ai-ya8.1.2:1.1_10: one who has supreme mind that arises,
ai-ya8.1.2:1.1_11: one who has unsurpassed mind is supreme ...
ai-ya8.1.2:1.1_13: one who is not concentrated mind ...
ai-ya8.1.2:1.1_15: when the mind is not liberated,
